comments:
Eclipse 3.2 M6

The following exception occurred while the Problems view was updating during a build. This build was started by selecting "Clean..." on a group of projects.

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 277)

Although this is hard to replicate it is easy to see the problem - we are allowing  expansion of stale categories as we were setting the list of markers too soon.

Fixed in build >20060510
*** Bug 135895 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
